TEXT.S: Azerbaijan Itini i 40 30 N, 47 30 E, noAsiya ko Azerbaijan. Polong no sekalay i 86,600 sq km "saka 113 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 82,629 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 3,971 sq km " Polong i 9,872,765 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 57.60 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 11.30 , malo no roma to a sera 31.10 . siyoto O [[[Baku]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakalima 28 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Ilham Aliyev, patirengan a romi'ad i 2003 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 31 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
